”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”

Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des: Improve your communication skills one day at a time! In his daily tips, Mitch Jackson shares three decades of award winning trial lawyer advocacy and business communication tips to help good lawyers become great trial attorneys and, smart business owners become better communicators.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
